message: Let's start with a fair split. I'm happy to take a bit less to get this done quickly.
I'm willing to take a bit more, but I'm not giving away too much. Your turn to negotiate!
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need a better deal than that. Let's work something out!
I'm getting closer to my target. You're getting closer to mine too. Let's see if we can meet in the middle!
